attributes.title: Winter Game Preview - Jan 6, 2023
attributes.caption: Resident Evil 4, Fire Emblem Engage, Star Wars Jedi: Survivor
attributes.description: Ep 352 - It's a new year with new games to get ready for, and we talk about everything we're looking forward to across the next few months, including Fire Emblem, Resident Evil, and Star Wars Jedi: Survivor.

attributes.title: Skull & Bones is a Ghost Ship - Jan 13, 2023
attributes.caption: Skull & Bones, Ubisoft, Xbox
attributes.description: Ep 353 - Skull & Bones has been delayed again, contributing to rough waters at Ubisoft. Plus, Xbox is planning a Direct, and we check out this year's nominees for the DICE Awards.
attributes.display_title: Skull & Bones is a Ghost Ship - Jan 13, 2023

attributes.description:

attributes.title: Infinite Open Worlds - Mar 17, 2023
attributes.caption: Naughty Dog, The Last of Us, E3, Xbox
attributes.description:
